item.title: Tooltips
item.description: Accessible Tooltips Demo Launch â†— Accessible Tooltip [role="tooltip"] { display: none; } button:hover + [role="tooltip"], button:focus + [role="tooltip"] { display: block; } button { font-size: 1.25rem; border-radius: 0.33em; font-family: inherit; width: 50px; height: 50px; color: #fefefe; padding: 0.75rem; border: 0; background: #fff; } svg { width: 100%; } Hi, I'm tooltip text!
